doc:
Romola Remus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romola_Remus 0 Romola Remus Dunlap (April 7, 1900 – February 17, 1987) was an American actress who was the first to play Dorothy Gale in film, in the 1908 multimedia stage/film production The Fairylogue and Radio-Plays, an adaptation of the Oz books. She worked directly with author L. Frank Baum, the creator of the character. Romola_Remus_Dunlap ( April_7_,_1900 – February_17_,_1987 ) was an_American_actress who was the_first to_play Dorothy_Gale in film , in the_1908_multimedia_stage/film_production The_Fairylogue_and_Radio-Plays , an_adaptation of the_Oz_books . She worked directly with author_L._Frank_Baum , the_creator of the_character .
